subject: United Nations Compensation
body:
United Nations Compensation Payment.
World Bank/United Nations
Compensation Payments Directives.
worldbankdaviidmalpass11@gmail.com
 
World Bank Payment Contract 2023
 
Attention: 
 
After our meeting today concerning your unclaimed fund of 30 million Dollars (Thirty Million Dollars) in the World Bank (WB), I was instructed to contact you by the board of directors and the Compensation committee on foreign matters. Before I proceed, I want to make it clear to you that we decided to stop communication with you in the past because you have always doubted all our words and decided to follow the instructions of African hoodlums and impersonators that you were dealing with, whom are also only interested in extorting money out from you and use you as their prey.
Anyway, We decided to contact you today to alert you on the status of your fund during our meeting on the round-table with the President of the World Bank in Foreign Matters,  and we were advised to contact you and make sure that your fund gets to you before the closure of the payment system in no distance time, only if you can follow our instructions this time around because some options have been made for you to receive your fund without any more delay. Now the ball is in your court as I have been advised to allow you to choose the way you want your fund to get you which I am going to explain to you as soon as I hear back from you to prove that you are now ready to receive your fund this time around without doubting us again.  Lastly: remember that we are not going to accept any form of delay from you regarding this current transaction because our office has been given 72 hours which is three working days to make sure we conclude this transaction or it will be canceled without any delay
 
Kindly get back to me as soon as you receive this email for further instructions.
 
Thanks for your anticipation and understanding.
 
Yours Sincerely,
MANAGING DIRECTOR
CONSULTANT PAYMENT CENTER.
DAVID MALPASS
worldbankdaviidmalpass11@gmail.com

subject: Re:   United Nations Compensation
body:
Hello David Malpass,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your email has certainly piqued my interest. It's not every day that one hears about an unclaimed fund of such a large amount.

I'm curious though, how did this situation come about? How did my name get associated with this unclaimed fund? And why is it that the payment system is closing in no distance time?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing more about this intriguing matter.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samantha

subject: Re: United Nations Compensation
body:
*This is to inform you that we have received your email. We want to bring
to your attention that your email and name, listed as Samantha, have been
identified in our database as someone who has not claimed their funds. This
is the reason for our contact.*

*Please verify if you have had any dealings with the World Bank in the
past. If so, kindly get in touch with Mrs. Janet Yellen to facilitate the
release of your funds, as she is awaiting your response*

subject: Re: United Nations Compensation
body:
I acknowledge receipt of your email. I wish to inform you that, at the
commencement of each year, the World Bank and the United Nations select 10
fortunate individuals who are awarded the sum of 30 million dollars each,
as part of their efforts to alleviate global poverty. The selection process
is random and involves choosing email addresses.

After reviewing our records, we discovered that your email is among the 10
selected individuals who have been entitled to receive these funds for over
three years. While it's possible you may have been notified previously, we
are reaching out to provide you with the latest update on the process of
receiving the funds.

You are strongly advised to contact Mrs. Janet Yellow, who has been
designated to handle the disbursement of your funds. She has received
explicit instructions from the Board of Directors to ensure the successful
transfer of your funds to you. Please follow her guidance diligently to
facilitate the receipt of your funds.

Congratulations once again!

subject: Re: United Nations Compensation
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear about these unclaimed funds. I don't recall having any dealings with the World Bank in the past.

Could you please provide more details about these funds? How did they come to be associated with my name? And how can I get in touch with Mrs. Janet Yellen?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samantha

subject: Re: United Nations Compensation
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear that my email address has been selected for such a significant award. I'm curious, how exactly does this selection process work? And could you please provide more details about the efforts of the World Bank and United Nations in alleviating global poverty?

Also, I would like to know more about Mrs. Janet Yellow. What is her role in this process and how can I get in touch with her? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samantha

subject: Re: United Nations Compensation
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear that my email address has been selected for such a significant award. I'm curious about how this process works. Could you please provide more details about the selection process? How are the email addresses chosen?

Also, could you tell me more about Mrs. Janet Yellow? What is her role in this process and how will she assist me in receiving these funds?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samantha
